lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gently hits the side of Molly's cheek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord regurgitates saline solution.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it, (vomiting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha starts throwing up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Uh-oh, it's happening again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there appear to be any sign of wreckage, or anything else that looks like it might not have made its way through this path because of other dangers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, who have been keeping a discerning eye, and you rolled what on your perception check before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15, but that was a bit ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again as you've stopped at this place here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not as good this time, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Something shifts in the water ahead, almost beyond your vision. Something that was stationary before, and looked like a log that had been resting in the water, dips away from you in the direction of the noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nobody move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gently light up one of my swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and mark that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're going to move, move onto the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we stopped the cart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're on horses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we on horses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are still on the path, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we stop moving the cart?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something just moved in the water. It might be able to hear our movements, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it a snake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It moved away from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It moved away though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It moved in the direction of the sound. You hear it again (panicked bird croaking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really want to see what it is. Oh, you don't have a bird, you have a cat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is this terrain similar at all to Xhorhas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In places where you grew up, some hunting and some places in your nomadic lifestyle put you in terrain very similar to this. So you're pretty comfortable here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a ball bearing out and toss it and throw it into the swamp. See what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some poor fish is going to try to eat that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's probably going to die. Oh man, poor guy. He'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use Minor Illusion, and about 30 feet away above the water, just above the surface of it, I'm going to create a little hummingbird and have it whip back and forth above the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's clever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to see what--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continues for a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Move it a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No reaction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make it disappear. I think we're okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we continue on, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should call out and see if Febron is here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's Febron, maybe that's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's a call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're just getting into this swamp right now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're maybe an hour into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would we know if this is the stretch of road that they were talking about, that they were having issues with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were cut off from the safe house. You don't know where the safe house is, or what location it is at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the safe house is in the swamp, it's not in Berleben, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We press on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe not calling out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can climb a tree! Are there any tall trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of tall trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I start climbing a tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you want to get a little closer and climb a tree?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general athletics check as you jump off the side, your legs (slurping) into the swamp, as they sink about a foot with each step, leaving these heavy footprints behind that fill with water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way through the swamp, the suction doesn't stop you one bit. You grab the nearby tree and climb to the top and get off to a branch and look in the direction. Make a perception check, please. That's cocked. How could you do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a part of a tree has fallen into it, and the liquid is generally darkening the bottom of where it's been stuck. You don't know how long it's been there. There is the dark root, and crooked branches, and elements of it sticking up in the air. The smell of bog rot is very strong, even from this proximity to it. You see something moving in the center of this bog, struggling, shifting. You see, covered in this tar-like material and flailing, some sort of humanoid creature of jet black skin. It's not skin-- feathers. It's fighting against the swamp, it's small. Shifting out of the water off to the side, slowly up to the bog, probably what Beau saw earlier, some sort of reptilian creature with a long snout and a long tail. Curving around and making its way slowly towards the bog. As the flailing bird creature is attempting to give a (panicked bird croaking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Guiding Bolt on the reptilian creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 120 feet distance and you said that the bog is 100 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. That was going to be a-- uh-oh, over here. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a-- shit, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guiding Bolt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC on any of your spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's your proficiency, plus your wisdom, plus eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus seven? It fails. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, ah! 4d6, ah! Eight, ten, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage. All of this divine energy suddenly bursts and burns around the creature's body. As it suddenly spins, with this hiss in the direction, looking around and seeing nothing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, we'll save you! There's a thing, and it's trapped and there's the reptile thing that's going to eat it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where? Which direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Over there. I point and I start climbing over and try to get to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we even see her anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her in the tree, you don't see what she's looking at and pointing at. She climbs down the tree and begins running in that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's about 100 feet away. Don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's ran off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. I'll run off after her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we saving?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Right now, we're saving Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still on a horse, yeah? I'm on a horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yeah. You're staying on your horse to get there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm staying on my horse!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to hard tax your horse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (galloping) How cool is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's cool for the first minute before it goes (mud slurping).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guiding Bolt is an attack thing, so I have to roll to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, got you. Roll to attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. Okay, it definitely hits. It's plus seven, 16, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. All right, cool. So timeline worked out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, this is the visual from the side that you see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, map time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so glad we checked out what it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (beatboxing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So many trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, look at all these trees.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This here is the gator that you see making its way there. It is very large.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's really big. Look at that teeny little bird guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you make your way up over to that side. The rest of you are currently trying to catch up on that end of the table. That being the case, I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what we never do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tap into our pool of luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, shit! Our fate point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The thing that we've been hauling around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we never use it. We've never ever used it. Ever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, using what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know the dodecahedron thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to focus on it in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to stare at it for a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep it in mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then we pass it around, so you have this as a chip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously we didn't do it this morning, but from now on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just say we pass the coin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Luck is for suckers, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who wants it for tomorrow? Or for next, for after the fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the next eight hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading this direction--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's hope nobody dies in this fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, it's important that it is kept hidden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: North is that way. That's the direction you were traveling was this direction. You're heading this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: North is that direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. 25 to 20? 20 to 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that's pretty crappy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not close enough to really do anything yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you got 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you got 15?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You assume there's only one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to 15 to ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get, Jester?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, Yasha, Caleb, Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Big six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got a six?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oo-wee!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shooter, coming out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Molly, you're up first. At a full double dash, you can catch up, at this point, almost to Jester. It's rough terrain because it's a swamp. You guys, we'll say, get about there, and Molly, you're a little bit behind, because Beau is a little faster than you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, sure. She probably did a little (whooshes).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That's your turn. That gets us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh. Okay! I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dun-dun-dun-dun lollipop!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dun-dun-dun-dun-dun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you placing that? 60 feet range?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. That's right. It's a 60 foot range. How far can I get it? That's true. Oh, I guess I can run forward first before I do it. I'm going to run forward and try to get up on that tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's rough terrain against the swamp because it's very (marshy sloshes).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That's about as far as I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you can get, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. I'm going to stand on that log so I'm out of the swamp.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Log! It's big, it's heavy, it's wood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really obnoxious, yeah! We'll say right there. You're on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on a log.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. I can't get it quite that far, can I? Hold on. Let me check one last thing before I definitely do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get almost to it with a 60-foot range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll put it as close as I can to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there is the closest you can get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That's my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my action, I'm going to wait until it's close enough, and then I'm going to hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding my actual action to attack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you use an action to hit with it? I think it's a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's dumb. That was dumb on my part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From my perspective, it looks like the gator is super stoked about having this lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is his lucky day. This lollipop apparates out of the swamp water and is now hovering there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold Sacred Flame to cast on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Ending Jester's turn, that brings us to Yasha. Full run. What's your speed?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 40 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 feet. You're right up next to Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking linebacker 40-yard dash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (heavy quick footsteps)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't walk in, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's double dash, because you guys all stayed back while Jester ran in. You're all barely getting caught up to her at this point. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will do my full movement forward. 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, comparatively. Just knock them around!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These happen to be made of metal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you get more out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, I'm feeling so fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you could double dash!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will dash. You know, to catch up to them, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your regular movement speed, you'll get up to where Caleb is. Sorry, where Molly is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bonus action dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bonus action dash will get you up to where, up to the edge and about, we'll say right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I get two attacks. Two actions now, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have an extra action. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. That's still out of range of hand crossbow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, no it's not. It's that I have to fire at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Sure. I'll do that, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can use the extra action to go closer as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or extra attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll use one action to get closer still. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's swampy. (marshy sloshing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll test the air and do a lob shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, arcing it over. With disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Ooh. Two plus something, so it's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It goes wide. Sticks into one of the nearby swamp trees over here. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really close, though!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, Caleb! I failed you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's within range of my radiant blast now, so I can attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, so do that as you release the bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. The Sacred Flame is what I meant to say. Dexterity of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure with a two. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait. Do I get more because I'm level five now? "Spell damage increases when you "reach--" Oh 2d8, yes. Oh, good. Three whole damage, woo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love this cleric.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's still something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fucking dumb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (mockingly) I can't do anything. I suck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can mend the shit out of some wheels, though, bitches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It approaches--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because at this point, you realize, the one that was approaching it was approaching it from the opposite direction that Beau saw the other thing move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I was wondering why it was coming from the other direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this low growl. You hear the growling, sucking sound as it approaches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make a strike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no. Don't die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! What if it's a trap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A two? Are you fucking serious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Screw you, Snitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dice can hear you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Apparently. So yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's so pissed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Although, technically, the creature is restrained, so it does have advantage on its attacks. Yeah, attack rolls against it have advantage, because it's restrained. So the first attack missed, the bite. The tail does hit. The jaws, it missed with a one and a two on the first strike. The second one it swings with its tail-- Hey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going by the rules. It's restrained. The second one, the tail, does hit. Crack! This is going to be 19 points of bludgeoning damage. As the tail cracks across the scrambling bird, you watch as it goes limp and is currently unconscious, its tiny form now stuck in the bog and unmoving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should have got to it sooner!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so prehistoric!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now we're in this for a dying bird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we staying in this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, man. I'm up here. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Fine. I'll use my speed to approach 15 feet. Half of 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your speed will get you about there. You and Caleb are about the same space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use Eldritch Blast at 120 feet for the gator. The farthest north.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll the attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the second beam 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll for the attacks on each of those?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did not. I have never played this game before, apparently. Thank you guys for your patience. That is a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. Both go wide off into space. No damage to that croc. However, as it slams into the wood nearby and the ground, it turns in your direction, noticing now the arriving brigade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my bonus action to cast--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're the brigade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, that's it. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round now. Molly and Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we doing this? Birds die this way all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a bird!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? It's feathery!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it looked like a person, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But look. I mean, two big-ass, right at the dinner table, we're real far away. Going to take a hot minute for us to get there. The bell's been rung.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if it's Febron?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at least going to get up to-- What's a basic movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of this, at movement, because the space is not right here, so I'm going to get you on the edge of the map for your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I within 60 feet of either of these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we doing this? Well, we're doing this. I'm going to try and cast Enthrall on the closest gator.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The closest gator? Okay then. Let me pull it up here. That's a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wisdom save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enthrall. All right. You weave a distracting string of words (mumbles).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enthrall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has advantage on the save because you guys have attacked it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't attacked that one yet. Oh, you're right. Yes, of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it's not successful attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a two plus zero. That is an eight plus zero.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think it makes it, actually. You're really lucky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is eight my save on wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC? It should say. Is it charisma-based?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says wisdom, but I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a wisdom save, but is the ability your racial ability?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, yeah it's a racial ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, then it's charisma-based, because all of them are, so it's DC ten. It still succeeds, actually. It rolled really poorly. So the creature has disadvantage to perceive any creatures other than you until the spell ends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has disadvantage to perceive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. It ain't going to eat. It means it's going to pay attention to me and only me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful. Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I'm sitting. I'm spinning my sword and talking in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In gator.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Infernal voice)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to have paid attention. I mean, it senses all of your presence, but it's focused on you. If any of you are trying to get around stealthily, it's going to have a hard time noticing you. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I able to have enough movement to get on this stumpy stump?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get up to here, I'd say, if you move at the same pace. That's your movement. You have your action and your bonus still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I'm-- I'm not within 60 feet of any of them, am I? No, I guess I am to throw a thing. Can I use my bonus to move a little bit further onto the top of this tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to spend a ki point to do your step of the wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My step of the wind? I can't get within range of them with my step of the wind though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Although if you aren't moving towards that tree and you move there instead--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I move straight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's still the same. Yeah, just out of range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get them ninja stars out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to ninja star for my main attack and if I can-- I don't know if I can-- I can't move on my bonus, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you spend a ki point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only if I move a ki point. Right. Nah, fuck it. Ninja star.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it. You get two at the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's a 20 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, and a natural 19 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage on each.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are 1d4s, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're darts. I think they're homebrewed darts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think it's 1d4. For the first one, that's seven. For the second one, that's five. Gambit style!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Total armpit throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw them both, they (whoosh whoosh) and it's like (low growl) and it opens its jaws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I point at Percy and I go, "He did it!" Oh, I called him Percy! I think that's the first time I've done that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's the first time any of us have ever done that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I point at Molly. He did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Grog) He did it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw! I miss Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) Light the corner of my mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your guys' turns. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, god! Can I climb up on this tree right in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my move, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy. Don't fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, let me put you up there in the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good! I'm going to cast Blindness/Deafness at level three on both of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level three, a different target.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty great. What's the wisdom save on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blind or deaf?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's both.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that spell do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blindness/Deafness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a con save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Con save. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either blinded or deafened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 19 on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one, however, is blinded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's blind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as, all of a sudden, the eyes darken and it begins to (snarls), flailing about, unable to actually make a bead on where any of you are at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got a disadvantage on his attack rolls? Is that what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, and advantage on attack rolls against it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. Okay. Then I'm going to use my spiritual weapon to come up behind the other gator and smack him on the back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boop! Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Someday, I'm going to know what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not concentration, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Spiritual Weapon is just up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just lasts for a minute?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Blindness/Deafness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a minute of pain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of each of its turns, it can make a constitution saving throw. Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus seven to hit. That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie-dokie. That is eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Your lollipop slams into the back of that distant alligator, but it's still right there with the unconscious creature in front of it, starting to figure out where to keep its focus. It seems hungry, but it's also being assaulted. That ends Jester's turn. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. How close can I get to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Movement will get you up to there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get that fired up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Your vision goes faintly dark red as you begin to focus your frustration towards these creatures. What do you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I can't move anymore, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to move, if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least it'll get you into the fray. That's as close as you can get there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that I see one of the giant gators is getting close to Nott and also Yasha, so I'm going to tug really hard on the Glove of Blasting and revolve around my wrist three times and use Scorching Ray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scorching Ray. Go for it. Roll three attacks on it, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Edubation. Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many rays is it? Three rays?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three attacks, advantage against the target, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Second one is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third one is a 17. So they all hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all hit. Second set of rolls is doubled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Here we go. Dang it! Total of 21 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Not bad at all. Looking up at the distance, you tug on the glove and release as these three bolts arc out and slam into the rather broad side of this reptilian creature, this large crocodile that's now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that the one that is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blinded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Then I will keep wading through the shit, try to get a little bit closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With that, you get to about there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And say, "Hey! Fjord, isn't this fun?" And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Caleb's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because that gator is blind, does that mean it counts as sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will bolt, bolt, bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three attacks. They all hit. 19, 15, 13, plus things

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But what if you get a natural 20? Roll again, in case you get 20's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll roll again. Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, he did!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of them is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got to roll them in order, though, because you don't know if the one that got sneak attack is. You have to declare that when it happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They all get sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you only get sneak attack once per round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Got it. Well, it was the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one got crit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So the first one would've been sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First strike--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --is 17 plus four, 21. Plus I'll use Fury of the Small, making it 26.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How often do you get to add that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just once a day. Then second does not get sneak attack? Even though it's at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not per round, per turn. So you can still get it on a reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six, but that's doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you rolled on the dice, doubled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four, so eight. Eight for that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then one more. That's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage. This poor gator turned around, went blind, got shot multiple times, blasted with fiery beams.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It still can't stop thinking about Mollymauk, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just so focused on him. That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to move behind that rock over there. (yelping) That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It is now the crocs' turns. (counts movement) It actually climbs up the rock after you, (stomping) and then goes and takes a swipe down at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: +2 on your AC.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 23 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, 3d10 plus five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 3d10 plus five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a large set of jaws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be using Uncanny Dodge for the first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of piercing damage, halved. You take ten points of piercing damage, but you are grappled as the giant jaws slam into you and hold you in place. You're unable to escape at that point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelping) We're both reptiles, man! Come on! Be cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are goblins reptiles?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe he's dumb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, now I'm getting Little Mermaid vibes, though, from the gator. (singing) Up where they walk, up where they run, up where they stay all day in the sun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take a swing with its tail towards you as it's flailing about, hearing noise in that direction. It has disadvantage against you. That's 22 and 12. That misses in the first attack as its tail goes wide. It turns around and snaps its jaws towards the tree and scrapes off the side of the tree and swings in your direction, as it attempts to bite towards you. That's going to be a 14. What's your armor class?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14's your armor class? That's right. You have the jaws slam onto you. You suffer 18 points of piercing damage, but because you're raging, that's reduced to nine. You get nine points of piercing damage, but you are grappled and restrained currently, as you are now trapped in its jaws. You watch as Nott's hands are dangling out of its toothy jaws, it's swinging her in the air. Yasha is lifted up off her feet and is currently trying to pry the jaws open off of her body, but is unable to do so. Death saving throw for the creature. That's a failure. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And two more bursts of Eldritch Blast to the gator holding Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding Nott? Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit. That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great. 12 points of damage on the first one, and six points of damage on the second one, so 18 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. As you release the two bolts, they manage to peek around the tree, see it grasping Nott in its jaws and swinging her back and forth. One hits the bottom of the jaw, and the other hits its side. You see this little splatter of dark crimson alligator blood from the two impacts, but it's still holding taut to this tiny little morsel it has in its jaws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my pathetic speed to try and match Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Want to move Caleb up for me, Beau? Somebody?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, or Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. Meant to say Fjord to Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, this is so much fun. I'm glad we are helping this random-ass penguin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least you guys have range. That brings us to the top again. Molly and Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to go first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get to this guy who's got Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to parkour off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its vision comes back. However, it fucked it up for a round. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a parkour off of the rock and come down and try and get it right in its mouth to try and get it to spit out Nott. So the first attack. That's good. That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better. That's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. With two strikes with the staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spit it out! Both of those are the same, which is seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage each? So 14? Cool. It's 14 points of damage with the two strikes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slamming into the side of its heavy, thick, scaled hide. It's hurting, but it's definitely a resistant beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point now to do two more, flurry of blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull your staff behind and then you go to a punch and a dropkick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an 18, and they just keep getting better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Way to go. That hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses, unfortunately, but you do get one punch off. After slamming it twice, you go for the softer part and whack!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what? I rolled the wrong damage die for those first two, but that's my fault. Six damage. I rolled d6s instead of d8s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, gotcha, but there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That gator got lucky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you take off the damage you did and reroll as eights?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because that's how the cookie crumbles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still a fair amount of damage. Molly, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With my running speed, how close can I get and still have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's as far as I can get without an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you guys are running through a swamp behind who engaged it, so it's an unfortunate circumstance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, then, I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fortune favors the bold in this case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Since I still have some distance, I'm going to try some Vicious Mockery to see if that does anything. The one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please Schwarzenegger it with, "You're luggage."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious what that's going to sound like. I'll hit the Vicious Mockery on the one that currently has Nott, just because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. That is a natural 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no. (Infernal coughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A swamp bug goes into your throat as you're trying speak it, and you have to cough it out for a second. That finishes Molly's run. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Invoke Duplicity as my action, and I'm going to pop my little person down right behind the other side of the gator that Yasha's fighting, yes. Then for my bonus action, I'm going to cast Healing Word on the little bird creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll to heal on that one. It's within range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of healing. You watch as suddenly, its yellow eye flickers and looks around for a second and it begins to push against the slickness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My invoked Jester turns around and thumbs ups to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks at it. (bird croaking) It begins to try and pull its way back out of the bog. It's getting stuck and sliding in, but it's trying to pull itself backward. That's your turn, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'm in the jaws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In its jaws. So you are restrained. You can still attack it, but you're at disadvantage on all your attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I will try to attack. Divine fury, and if I do reckless, does that mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you reckless, it'll become regular attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make your two strikes. First one with divine fury as you swing down towards the top of its jaws with your blade.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to swing, the jaws tense against you and (groans) it hurts and all your muscles tense from the pain, but you stay focused going for your second strike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry, hold on. Oh wait, no, I'm doing this one. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit, roll damage. This still gets divine fury though, because it's the first strike that you hit with.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the first strike, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, this is exciting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so eight--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Infernal voice) Crocodile Dundee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been plugging everything into this one croc since the beginning of the battle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I actually able to-- If I have my hand on his jaws, just pull them apart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can because you're inside of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Open the jaw, just stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull yourself, you pull the jaws open and step out of it, getting your feet on the ground as you yank apart. You put your leg up into it and (snapping). You feel the jaw pop. It falls back for a moment, its jaw now limp and its tongue lolling out to one side. You have your blade and you do the finishing blow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I mean describe to me the finishing blow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, finishing blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Breaking its jaw isn't going to kill it. So how do you kill it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll try to chop off the head as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. After breaking the jaw you step out, pull the blade from behind you and with a wide swipe, like an anti-cavalry blow, you cut through the side of its throat and neck. It doesn't get all the way through, but it cuts enough through the spine where it falls to the ground. This long, heavy, limp piece of luggage. We'll leave that there for its size, though. You going to stay where you are? You want to move? Because you still have movement, you've been released from its jaws.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can I move towards the back of the other one? In front of Jester; in between the croc and Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get. Well, you can get there, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perfect. Yeah, perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, it seems like I'm-- can I get within 30 feet of it? No, correct? I would think probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving your speed will get you right up to the edge there, so it's just out of 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just out of 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to cast Magic Missile at level three because he's got my little friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's five missiles?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is five missiles total. Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trudging through the swamp, cast the spell, and then release. The five missiles all impacting at once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice, nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20 on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Broken clock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total of 18, so (firing noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Along its side of it, it's still holding Nott in its mouth, and Nott's muffled screaming from inside of its jaws as it swings her back and forth. It seems singularly focused on destroying whatever it has its mouth on. It's a beast. That finishes your turn, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling) Disappointed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use my first action to try and resist the grapple and escape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to contest it. It's an escape DC of 16; it's athletics or acrobatics, your choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acrobatics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, whatever's-- yes, Acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make the check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 is enough. You manage to just squeeze out of its jaws and land back on the ground where you are, slipping out a brief moment of its opening and get there. There's blood streaked down, you can feel the pain from the teeth that have been digging into your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it engaged with Beau? Can I get a sneak attack on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great. I will shoot it in the face. Ooh, not great. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. You pull out, and from being shaken around you're a bit dizzy and the pain swelters in your body, and as you go to fire it ricochets off of its hide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he flanked with Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yes actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit, roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow. Okay, that's a hit. Ooh, they're all bad. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage, sneak attack. The first strike hits underneath the throat, slips into a piece of its already open, cracked, heavy hide and it-- (growls).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If that was one side of the throat, I'll go for the other side. Oh, terrible, 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you still get advantage because you flanked!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, still advantage, or that's just once a turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's advantage on every strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow, okay. That hits! That's an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This rollercoaster, the emotions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like the Simpsons Frogurt scene.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question, would this trigger my reaction for Sentinel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it's not attacking anything that's outside of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it might in a second, because I'm going to run behind that tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay! That's good to know. Oh, this is Nott's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get away. Get away as fast and as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Away from over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Any way you think it won't see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get right there. It does try and snatch its jaws towards you in the process. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll it and be proud. Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an eight, nine, and a five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you get Uncanny Dodge again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 plus five. 28 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can I use Uncanny Dodge again because it's gone around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use it once per round, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, uncanny dodge to make it 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of piercing damage, however, you are grappled in its jaws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Again? I just got out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jackson. As you run away the jaws grab and pull you back and you're being held and shaken again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now do I get that opportunity attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you do, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, just when I think I'm out, they pull me back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it strikes out and grapples Nott in the jaws, you do manage to get one swing at it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I whack it right in the nose, because that's what I was taught with bears. I go: No!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Sharks, and bears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of sharks in Kamordah, it's a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit! Roll some damage on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be high! Okay! 12 damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage, all right. Crack! You hit it right across the snout, and upon the impact its eyes go dazed for a second but it continues to chew. It's still standing. That finishes Nott's turn? All right. The one standing croc is going to drop Nott out of its jaws--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's nice of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And attempt to bite again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood Curse of the Eyeless, amplified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage. Even with disadvantage that's a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tail hits you. That's 2d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no. Shame on you DM. No more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one, not this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 18 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: MATT You are knocked prone and it's going to try and bite you. That's what it was doing on its turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. But it has advantage on a prone creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's even.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regular roll.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (to the tune of "Breaking the Law") Regular roll, regular roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 17 to hit, what's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 18 now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because of the Haste, but I don't know, I'm dead. Do I have Haste if I'm unconscious?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's the one that cast--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But does an unmoving body move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to make a quick call here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're calling someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I'm calling Jeremy Crawford to confirmation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to phone a friend, but in the case the friend is Nathan Stewart. "Hey, Chris Perkins?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Regis Philbin imitation) Would you like to phone a WotC friend?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you were just prone, he would still have it, so if the spell is still active.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matthew Mercer. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The spell is active because it makes you faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, it's still active by rules as written, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe she's vibrating on the ground. Like when a pager goes off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, spells end when they say they end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This feels wrong. Do it, just do it, I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't want to. You don't want to take it. Well hold on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's looking at the Great Wall. He rarely references the Great Wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rarely references the Great Wall? No, that's a 17 still, so with the Haste bonus, that would still miss yeah. So here's what happens. As you fall unconscious--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't feel right about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you fall unconscious, your form is blurring slightly from the impact, and as you tumble, and it goes to strike and bite you, you're tumbling backward at such a speed, still under the effect of the spell carrying you, that you fall out of grasp of its jaws as you spin and spill out of its mouth as the teeth clamp. Plummeting to the ground. Not taking a critical hit and immediately failing two death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good narration DM. Good narration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I even die fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'd be the end of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have Revivify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any 300 gold diamonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have lots of rings, do any of them have diamonds in them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not worth 300 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How dare you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying, you got to buy your spell components.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought if I had my symbol of the Traveler!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never done this before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura. It's okay. Components that cost money, you have to purchase, like his diamond and his incense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, hallo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a diamond that's worth 300 gold?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's worth 100, which is what I need for my spell, ja.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't die anyone, don't die. I thought I could bring you back. Why do I have that stupid spell prepared if I can't even use it?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the chalice dilemma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hero's Feast with the chalices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that finishes the croc's turn. As the Haste spell snatches Nott from the jaws of almost imminent death, Fjord you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucking see Nott fucking ragdolling all over the place. I'll use the rest of my speed to get as close as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That gets you up onto the battlefield there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that put me within 30 feet of that croc?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It puts you within 35 feet, it's just out of 30 foot range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm 35 feet away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ain't you got no long range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes it doesn't help to lag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just wanted to a little Witch Bolt. Two more Eldritch Blasts going at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for the attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 16 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh great, I thought it missed. That's not going to do it, that's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's ten plus four for 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just failed two death saves from that pun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He literally marked them off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the back of its head bursts behind it. Its eyes go dull before it slumps over the rock and it slowly slides into the edge of the swamp nearby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got the kill? You were barely in the fight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he totally came! He's good, he's a hero! Can I use my invoked Jester, my duplicate, to run over to Nott? She can move 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wouldn't be encumbered because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's an illusion. Correct. Here, in this instance, the illusion would not, I don't think, be affected by the rough terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful, I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At, you know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The lowest level possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At second level. We're about to get a rest, it seems stupid to-- oh, it's cocked. Five plus four. No. It would be plus four, plus four? No, it's 2d8 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, at 2nd-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay yeah, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That heals you up there, you come to consciousness, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was scary, I should not have been this close. Where were you? I was doing everything up there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, look, I'm up to my fucking knees in this quagmire, all right? It's a slop dolly of epic proportions!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A slop dolly?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I jump down and walk over to the little bird creature?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Kentucky knows what I'm talking about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a slop dolly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in just a moment, guys. We do have our Wyrmwood giveaway for the evening. We have, what is it, kalimantan ebony tabletop dice tray. This is the pretty awesome dark wood with the leather in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back everybody. Before we get back into the game, we have the winner of our fantastic Wyrmwood giveaway from the break: akpresto. Akpresto, congratulations, you won the awesome, awesome-wood-full game dice tray from Wyrmwood. We'll get that to you ASAP, thank you for coming in and everybody else who jumped into the chat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It smells a little like tuna, and that's not me, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's disgusting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't burp and then try to blame the smell on somebody else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm telling you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really foul.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Out of context quotes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry Matt, is there something you'd like to discuss with the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A purple worm erupts from the middle of the floor--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't tempt me. You guys all take a moment, tend to your exhaustion from plunging into this swamp haphazardly, some of you taking quite a beating in the process. Jester guides your attention to this now struggling small bird creature. It looks to be about the size of a an adolescent child, maybe no more than-- well, let's say a little younger than that, maybe like an eight or nine year old. But instead of skin, it's just black feathers. No wings really, the feathers are too small among the arm to actually be flight-ready. The lower half of its body is still sunken and thick in the bog. It has, where its face is, two bright yellow eyes, very crow, raven-like eyes and a long black pointed beak. And (scared bird croaking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry! I can help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scared chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me your hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I lift it up out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arms. Out of sockets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is watching all this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. With just a few moments, though your legs sink in a bit, you manage to pull, find leverage, grab onto some of the heavy vines on the side, and you manage to pull this creature out from the bog, until eventually it gets its legs free, and as it pulls its way up to the top, it begins to shrug off the thick bog slop that was keeping it stuck there in the center of the opening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is a bird person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you understand us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! Do you live around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Do you live around here?" (gasping)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's like a mockingjay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it was separated from its parents or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. Are you an adult or are you a kid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "A kid."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A kid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could, it would take an hour, but I could understand this one, if I set my mind to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could get a rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do you live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) And points its still soggy, feathered arm, to the east.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Close by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you get here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starts rummaging through, pulls one of the books--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! No. No, please. No, please, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Caleb) "Please no."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull my coat shut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should learn how to speak to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it wants some paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's your book?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Can you write?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or does he want to draw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out my journal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a theory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he only repeats what we say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begins to write into the book, and shows it to you. It says, "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're welcome so much! How old are you? What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It says "four," the number four. The name is "Kiri."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Kiri?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, you're four years old?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you doing here? What is this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skies go dark there. Father said the valley folk fighting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are. There's a big fight going on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far have you traveled? Do you recognize people that look like her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is your family now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sad chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, no, no! Are your Momma & Dad okay? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know where they went? How did you get separated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begins writing another small essay, in the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should keep an eye out. To make sure no more of those things come out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll keep an eye out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. One of you. Take it with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt seems adamant. That can't be good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We both roll, but--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of you is aiding the other. Unless you want to make two separate rolls. It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do two separate rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are keeping an eye out in the space around you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peruse these ruins a little bit, see what they are and what they look like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. (chirp) Finishes writing and shows it over, it says, "Swamp was to hide us. Swamp folk saw us. So we ran to not be taken. I wasn't watching and the bog "caught me. Family couldn't pull free. Couldn't risk sisters or selves, so kept going."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't want them to die for my carelessness." Closes the book (chirps).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sadly) We've got to get him to his family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know where they are heading?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know. Are you a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A boy bird, or a girl bird, or just a bird bird?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A word bird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Girl."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Girl bird! Kiri! Oh no. How many sisters do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts up four fingers with long, exaggerated feathered fingertips.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I recognize what species or race of people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't encountered these people before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Empire kids wouldn't know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Empire kids wouldn't know? The whole studied thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard of various different strange races out there. Bird people may have crossed in a story before but-- You've done a little bit of study. Make a nature check for you, Caleb, since you studied in this area, just general knowledge.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've never seen them before?

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kenku.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're small little groups. They look out for themselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like ravens, they are able to mimic many sounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. As part of their history, and you rolled a natural 20 so you know quite a bit, something in their lineage, there was a curse involved. Something based around the time of their creation, where their ability to converse was taken from them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mutter that to the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Oh man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kiri, have you happened to see a safe house, or a building or a structure around while you were fleeing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you see the swamp people that you were talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She points in a northeastern direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But your family went the other way? To the west?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The way we came from? We could always give her a horse--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was thinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Writes on the page, spins it around, it says "Nowhere to go. Can I come with you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you able to handle yourself in a scrap? Are you good with a weapon, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're how old?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't really know, but I'm twice her age at least!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got really good penmanship, so I don't think she's four like human four. Most four-year-olds can't write like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where we're going is a bit dangerous, we should warn you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To my question though, are you able to handle yourself in a dangerous moment in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks back at the bog, goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A monk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fearsome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we can keep her in the cart or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. If she stays with us at least until tomorrow, maybe I can send a message to your family and let them know you are okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "I'm okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Chirping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach behind my belt and pull out a dagger and twirl it in my fingers, and hand it hilt towards Kiri. Careful, it's sharp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Fjord) "It's sharp."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of creepy, man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have any more pocket bacon? Are you hungry?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I have a pouch of things this one might like!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you've got oats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have dried corn and oats and things. Would you peck on these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding the dagger, she goes forward and starts pecking out of your hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Ow. Ow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have some pastries, too, if you like sweets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey Caleb, you got a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head turns to you as well. Takes it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Many seconds. What do you need?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a look at this. Do these mean anything to you? Just looking at the stone structures that are here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled investigation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled an eight. They are stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's very old and has long fallen over and has been absorbed mostly by the swamp. It doesn't look like it was a large structure. Like it might have been a small, brief gatehouse off the path. Some sort of a watch post that had--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since he brought me over, what do I make of the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through it and making out the layout of it, it was definitely a post house for Berleben when it was first made. The stones look well over 100 years old. They have long been reclaimed by the roots and vines of the swamp. Nothing special beyond that really. Just an abandoned post.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just looks like a bunch of old crap, to be honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's disappointing. I kick it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me hold this dagger for just a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard grip on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give it back. I just want to test something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay, Kiri.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're just going to test your reflexes here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to throw--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. A little sparring. Punch here, hit here. Can you-- (punching sounds)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on her before she does this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to see before we give a dagger to a child.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To attack my hand? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You take two points of damage. You're like, "Oh!" Not bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A natural 20 got two points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if she needs a dagger. Here you go, child.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to die first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we cut open these giant gators and see what they have in their bellies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see if we can cut them and keep some of this leather. I bet it's worth a little bit of money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my axe and hit it in the belly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to carve into the two crocodiles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we'll check the guts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoever is helming that, make a medicine check to understand what parts of the body are most delicate. To try and open it without--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Choose your weapon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll take you the better part of the day to carve off enough of the hide to really be useful for trading. It's a long process, These are big creatures. You begin to carve off some of its hide. None of you are experienced tanners, so it's a lot of trial and error and sections of it tearing off prematurely. It's a very messy process. Jester is like hand to elbow covered in blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything fun in the guts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you checked in its stomach? You find a lot of bones, a lot of partially digested meat, and a lot of black feathers.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (dismayed) Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did Jester spend hours doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A while, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If she did, then Caleb would have spent one hour to cast Comprehend Languages as a ritual spell to talk to her, full on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take a short rest, then, to get my ki points back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I realize that this was-- Would I be able to tell from my medicine history that this is bird people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to be, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, could you tell from the bones it's a lot of bird people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks a handful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's this kid's parents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Beau, come on--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably the rest of the family, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The cousins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Might be the only one, she--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk Kiri away from this for the moment and say, after an hour has passed of me doing this ritual spell: For the moment, I can understand you as clearly as you can understand me.
