Do you want to tell me anything about your time in this swamp or what you want to do with yourself, now that you are alone or how we can best help you? Or anything you want to tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I just want to get back to my family."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She killed them all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, in the meantime, while we are looking for them, is there anything that we can do for you or is there anything that you can tell me about your last days here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an interesting point here, let me check something real fast here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That they don't talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is going to be a point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like a Rorschach test.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they talk to each other?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, you can get the note.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, their are hoots and whistles are some form of language, aren't they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he said that they were cursed, they lost their ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After casting the spell, there is no language to understand, it's only through mimicry. You managed to get the jist of that initial statement, through talking with it for a while, but the spell has no effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no spoken language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we tell her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know that this feathers are her parents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through with your medicine check, it looks like there's only three between the two of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three bodies. Were they big bones or little bones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look to be little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her sisters. Parents are alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then they're really sad, and they will be happy that one of their children--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What good will it do? I don't think that we need to tell her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no. We won't tell her that, I was afraid that it was her parents. But if we can let her parents know that she's okay, then at least--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said that you could send a message?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well. The Traveler's been teaching me some stuff and I was asking him the other night about how I could thank my mama and stuff like that. He taught me a little bit of how to send messages across distances.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. But don't you need to know who you're telling it to or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I think if it's familiar enough, then I can send it. Maybe if she describes them, I could do it. I haven't ever tried it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should try it now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I needed to send it to-- Oh, I have to prepare it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's haul this all back onto the cart and get on our way and see where we get.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Her parents just left her, you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We shouldn't go fighting with her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were three other kids, you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you propose we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blood all over my hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We gave her a dagger. Point her in the right direction that her parents are going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't leave her, the swamp things will kill it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if she comes with us, then we will kill her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's her size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing at full height, maybe about three and a half feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless we can drop her off on the nearest town.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just going to kick her up out of the bog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will she be welcomed in a town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will she be welcomed anywhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, you said three or four, five hours for Jester to do all of that gator carving before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To actually harvest the actual armored hide will get you pretty close to dusk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's what you did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Than I use arcane recovery. That's all I wanted to ask, if I had time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, guys. We've seen how people react to Nott around here. What if we drag her in front of some crazy locals?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of this are great points, but I'm waiting for another idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I think we should do what we have done well so far, which is to improvise. It is better to bring her with her and then leave her and then if we find an advantageous place to leave her, then we will. But for the time being she is a sidekick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Caleb) "Sidekick."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair chance is better than none.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also possibly someone to watch the cart while we do our businesses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, in the morning I can send a message to your mom and dad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Mom and dad."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. We can gift you a horse, and then you can go find them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get back to the cart and at least try to make our way into some drier--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To see if we can find somewhere safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll carry this leather to the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "I'll carry this leather to the cart." She helps you to start lifting the carved stuff, but barely at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I love her, I love her.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: She's the best.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Welcome to The Mighty Nein!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) Walks right up to you, like face-- (chirping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just give her a kiss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (startled chirping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just so cute, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, she really is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And goes back to helping Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, to the cart, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know cats? Do you like cats? Do you know cats?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Birds don't like cats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a baby bird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cats don't like birds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, cats don't like birds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you like cats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into her hands. Frumpkin starts to purr and nuzzle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is spellbound by this moment of a cat appearing in her hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I ask Frumpkin to do a blep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A blep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And to lick her face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Throws the cat down, seemingly weirded out by the moment, doesn't quite know how to react.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Frumpkin starts chittering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's friendly. That is my cat. If you want to spend some time with him, you can. He is very soothing for me, anyway. Give it a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Picks up Frumpkin, and runs towards the cart as you guys get there and load it up. Kiri jumps up into the cart and turns around to the rest of you and goes, (like Nott) "Welcome to The Mighty Nein!" And starts petting Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love her so much!

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: She's the best of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this is never going to get irritating. Let's get on our way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight check her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an insight check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My insight is so bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to make it even better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bird person. "I'm bird p--" Not that kind of bird person, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't trust her. It's weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to point out that, if we pick up one more stray, there will actually be nine of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That can't happen. We will not have that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With Frumpkin--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we wouldn't be ironic anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cling to our irony.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we cheeky or are we serious? That'll totally change our entire disposition of the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can be both.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seriously cheeky? Cheekingly serious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's put a cloak over her, so she looks a little less like a bird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got some clothing that would fit her! My clothing. I give you my cape and and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But now you don't have a cloak on. I'll take off my cloak and put it on Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's a short cloak, it's a little one, don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a nice flannel, I'm going to want it back. Right now? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, now I'm cold, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb takes off his cloak and puts it on Jester. I never wear a cloak when we're not in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's okay. I'm actually really warm right now, I don't need anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all sharing cloaks for no reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not 85 degrees, it's still cold here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty chilly. It's like mid-60s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it back on Caleb and tuck him into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, it's a humid 60 degrees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels warmer than it is because of the moisture in the air, but it's not, like, warm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, you guys, we are trying to make it work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Molly and I take the lead on the horses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, where was the city you saw, the village of people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Points up in front of the road, in that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go in that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, that's the way that we go to find our--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can locate Febron Keyes, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to Berleben, a somewhat miserable-looking, but functional village here in the Dwendalian Empire. As you come off the road, the road gives way into this central district, which looks to be a smattering of stone slabs, cobblestone, and whatever pieces of material were left over from construction that helped fix and maintain a main road here in the central opening before it scatters into the rest of the city. What would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, did we get a short rest on the way in? Or did that not happen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester took most of the day to harvest a gator.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably look for an inn or something, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to look for Febron who is apparently in the Keystone Pub.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should look for the Keystone Pub!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Febron Keyes in the Keystone Pub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the (mumbling) district. I ran out of page--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the Puddles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the Puddles! It is in the Puddles. I got Pudd.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Puddin'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the Puddin'.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anybody outside right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are people walking through the streets. Some of them are carrying small sacks over their shoulder from one place to another, or in the process of wandering over to make about their business for the city, and they notice you approach, and they're slightly nosey, paying attention to these strangers that came in off the Byway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Disguise Self on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. To look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little halfling girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. (confused chirping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still me. I can change my body into other things, woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) She seems fascinated and enthralled by this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, here! Take my mask. Oh, but you have a beak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clicking) It's terrifying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just pull that cloak way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still this long, dark beak poking through, but you got what you got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's stylistic. That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a Percy mask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Plague Doctor it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keystone Pub, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Excuse me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one older woman going by, who's hunched, has her own hood up, and a long gray cloak. She's wearing a stained linen blouse and says, "What do you want?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely weather we're having, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weather's shit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! I was wondering if you could point us towards an inn, or the Keystone Pub maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keystone Pub's in the Puddles, that way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look for the crooked tower thing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you sleep there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you can. I wouldn't be caught dead there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here. Here's some pocket bacon for your trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What the fuck is pocket bacon?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You seem like you'd appreciate that more than money, so I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very confused, but I'll take it." Puts it in her pocket, keeps walking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much of that do you have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I swiped from a few places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole campaign, she's been subtly, stealthily stealing bacon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would do that. I have done that. I just want to say, wrap it up in a paper towel, stick it in your bag, fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From what we can see in the streets, is anyone carrying any weapons, or guards, or spears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a fountain that has completely folded in now at this point. It has fallen into itself. Bits of the water seem to have permeated through. It's an older relic of the earlier construction period.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Mending on the fountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love this place. This is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crownsguard keep an eye on you as you are the newcomers that walk in. You do notice, as you head down to the Puddles, that one of the guards that watched you enter trails back about 30 or so feet, slowly walking and keeping an eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pace behind the group and start catching up to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the wagon doing okay in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's doing all right. It's only about three inches of water averaged, so it's not a major hindrance. You're also going at a relatively comfortable pace now that you're in the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep pushing in, looking for any signage of the Keystone Pub.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, looking for the big tower thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check for both of you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, very important question, how is Kiri doing with Frumpkin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri is now enthralled in the back of the cart, hood up, Frumpkin curled up on her lap, and is slowly petting him. She's slowly petting him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I match pace with the crownsguard eventually, the one that's following us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come up and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slow behind to match his pace, who's following us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it first, and as soon as you look in that direction, you catch up with that, Fjord. You spot a small crooked tower, maybe about 25 or so feet high. It looks like there was originally a building here that fell into itself and collapsed, and they built a pub on top of it. Not very well, so it's a haphazard construct that looks somewhat unstable with bits of broken stone and-- The only way you can get up into it are rope ladders hanging down the front of it that lead into an archway that's open on the top. There are two oil lanterns hanging from the outside that give this faint glow to the exterior. From the inside, it looks warmly lit, though dark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would hang out here all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about an eight-foot climb to get to the threshold of the interior.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only way to get in is an eight-foot climb on a rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what it looks like, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go up there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he sees you slowing behind, he lets you catch up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should somebody stay with the cart, maybe? Because I feel like all of our awesome stuff that we just got will be taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This leather that we took--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bloody crocodile skins?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a beautiful piece of leather. We also have some fine tapestries. We have a safe. We have many things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Caleb can put his string around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to pull the silver thread around the edges of the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (deep voice) Please step away from the vehicle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just leave it on the base of the tower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of us can get in, but anybody else will set that off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Evening, miss."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Evening, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out of towners?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Passing through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, just don't make any trouble."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like trouble would make your life a little interesting, though, wouldn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't like interesting."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is that why you're stationed here? Is this by choice, or who'd you piss off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No trouble, miss."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's staring right through you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just simple, you know, trying to be polite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your name first."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beau."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Crownsguard Alexander."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crownsguard Alexander. So formal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't like you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get that a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can imagine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't start any trouble."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Get on your way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will wait because I don't like him telling me what to do and then I will get on my way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you're good and ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wait there, this awkward 30 second stare, he goes, "I'll just--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. No, I'm comfortable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let him know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be on your way." He turns around and walks back to his post.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wait, and then I give myself a this for winning that game of chicken. Yeah! Then I climb the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, what a great scene between husband and wife.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was me at 16 with every cop ever; that was great. This is the tiniest hill, and I will die on it. Never ended that well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This means nothing, and I want to win.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys keeping Kiri in the cart?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's coming with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri climbs up with you. (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, stay behind me a little bit, okay? Don't make yourself obvious, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to protect you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Protect."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're bringing her into the bar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't leave her in the cart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess not. Do you drink liquor, Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (confused chirp)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Booze?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just say no. No! Kiri, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, I'll give you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Don't!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what booze is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirp)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's going to try it sooner or later, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not let this little bird girl have booze.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll get her a Tirley Shemple, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, if you teach respect early on towards alcohol, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "That's true!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because if she has it, she won't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a bad idea. Let's go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's standing there with pale white skin, jet white-gray hair, white eyebrows, big white beard, with this black leather vest that's tucked into billowing dark brown pants and boots. He's got all these scars and tattoos across his forearms he's folded and he goes, "Right." Steps back, lets you in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a glance over to you as you step in, taking in the vicinity, and goes, "Hey! Welcome to the Keystone Pub! Oldest pub in the Labenda! The "oldest pub in the Labenda is beneath this one, but we rebuilt it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stunning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much. Glad you could make it. Where are you all from?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All over the place, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alfield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Alfield, that's a bit of a journey, isn't it? Well, glad you could make it. Not many folks "come that far over here to visit the swamp."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name, good sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Dent Bonswallow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a little bit high right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bon or Barn, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dent Bonswallow."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look around at the few patrons that are in here and see if any of them fit the description of Febron Keyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two teeth, busted eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks super cray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a shitty roll. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's only six other patrons, but they're too dimly lit for you to make out any features.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get up close to them and one by one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can look in a few more minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let your eyes adjust to the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Jester begins walking off through the chamber, he's like, "What can I get you guys? What "you asking for? What you looking for?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your strongest drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be the Labenda Throat Grog."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is-- what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Labenda Throat Grog."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Burns you like a fucker."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bender Throat Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's where it got its name."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, same color as the swamp? Green and shitty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds exciting. I think we need a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A round for everyone? You too?" Points to the little hooded creature next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's on the wagon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Kiri, like Nott) "On the wagon." (as Dent) "Right. Weird." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know I needed this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's going to put you back about 25 copper pieces."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I'll take it. No, I've got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This one's on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's easy for me to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need it for tax write-offs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boulder-parchment-shears!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They always fight for the check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boulder-parchment-shears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei. Snip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's pouring the drinks one by one: "What brings you to town? What brings you so far north "from Alfield?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We heard amazing things about this area, and we thought we would check it out, because we're travelers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Historical point of interest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, not many cities have a lot of water in them like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a shithole. But it's our shithole!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really cool-looking, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, I appreciate that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's exactly the magnet that I bought when I got in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you got one of the shithole magnets, too?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a shithole magnet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If anyone else wants any, I got a whole bucket of them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a shithole magnet, really, when you think about it. That's fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It spoke to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're building a stage for something? Is there some sort of circus in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I wanted some entertainment to liven the place up a bit. I've been here for ten years, "and it's been a bit dull."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you own the previous bar that this one's built on top of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did. Inherited it from my father, before it, you know."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How old is Berleben in general?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost three centuries."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, we love traveling around. Is there anything in Berleben that we just have to see before we leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you're there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. It's the finest pub in town."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, it's rough to start at the top, mate, but you make your way down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Worse ways to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we go shopping in town, maybe? We've got some leather to trade, may have some armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe. Your best bet for trade wouldn't be here in The Puddles. You'd be looking for the "Midway Docks. That's where most of the business gets done here. If you're looking for things for a "fancier space, maybe you want to head to The Stilts, but that's where the-- what's the word I'm "looking for-- folks who run the place stay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a fancier part of this town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's The Stilts. It's where it's all raised up. That's where the Summit House is, where the "Starosta stays. There's the Mossmire Temple, which is where the druid that keeps the swamp fane "stays. The Idolmaster."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're also going to be looking for a place to sleep. I don't know if you'd recommend anywhere that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're already here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have rooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!" He points down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's exciting!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Downstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that could be so much fun!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it haunted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you like things that are haunted?"

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's haunted!"

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it submerged in water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, we cleared out underneath. Everything that fell in, we cleared out, and we have "subterranean rooms."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very excited by this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do they have portholes to the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not a bad idea." He makes a note on a piece of paper. "There will be, in a few weeks."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they below the water level here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of them, no. But there's a few if you like it wee bit soggy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk away from the bar and stand near the door entrance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cover for Fjord a little bit. Just taking space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just fill it out. This is my bubble now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody get close!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many rooms do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Four."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much are they apiece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's see, for the inn put it about a silver piece per room."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figure we should stay in all four for a couple of days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Per person."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Per person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot more than you originally made it sound like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize for the miscommunication."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am perfectly okay with this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is haunted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is the case. You pay for them spirits."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there someone who can keep our cart? Do you have a place we can keep our cart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You brought a cart?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then yeah. We can keep it. I can keep it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep it where? Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (defeated) "You can take it to the stables."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Midway Docks. But I can do it for you! For just a few copper. A delivery fee."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'll do it because I want to see the town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight silver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said a silver per person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put a couple-- yeah, eight, that's fine, I've got that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. Deed is done. Thank you! Did you want me to be delivering your cart for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I can do it. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. If you ever get lazy-- "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the stable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bit large, there. It's in the Midway Docks, "so keep an eye out, ask around, you'll find it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonswallow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We heard about a kooky regular. We just have to meet him. Febron?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You looking for old Febron?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Febron Keyes, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably drooling down the side of the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man! I was going to look at everyone in here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We found him! We won!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's right here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We send the message back to The Gentleman, and we'll collect our money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were we given anything special to say to him or should we go wake him up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we have to secure the safe house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right, that's not-- okay, I'm sorry, I was confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just the contact who knows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go wake him up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to walk over and sit down at his table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wave my drink underneath his nose. Hey hey hey! I pop it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll flick him in the forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) "What the fuck you do that for?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem like such a charming gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have the full appearance here, and it's pretty busted. The Gentleman was wrong. There is one tooth, but it is black and angled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't take care of himself. He looks up. "So "what you doing?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just seem like such a charming gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why the fuck did you flick me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were sent for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From-- ? Where's my fucking drink?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A certain gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tension goes straight. This eye goes (fwoop!). Joins the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand him the drink one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You were sent by The Gentleman? Yeah? What's he want?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't drink from that again. Don't. Wash that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's sterile. By its very nature it's sterile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you use Mending on him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just on his teeth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't fix him, he's perfect!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would be a 9th-level spell, that's beyond--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a Wish! Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to help you with your troubles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Want nothing to do with it!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to deal with the safe house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nope. Think I'm fucking doing it? It's not my problem anymore! I don't want anything to do "with him, or any of his business. He wants to send more of his toadies out to a drowning death? Go "for it! That's up to you. I want nothing to do with it. You can do it without adding corpses by "my tangle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if you want another drink, then, you're going to show us how to get there and how to deal with it and what you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How is that? It's a drink for it? Eh, fuck you!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) I take my drink back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could also drag you back to The Gentleman if you'd prefer that, instead. Or you could point us in the right direction and let us take care of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True. He did not have the kindest things to say about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau gives a crack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so intimidating, Caleb. Really, really--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 15? The sweat begins to build a little more on his brow. He's like, "Well, I was just-- "don't need to be taking me back to him. You know, I don't want the work anymore."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know: keep it simple, stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Could I get another drink? Look mate, it's some shit going on out there in the "swamp. I bet he didn't tell you anything, did he?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it gators?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it wasn't gators!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh well, because we are really good at killing those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are very aware that he has sent us into something more troublesome than he has described, and we are willing to do that. We're told you are the one who can get us in the right direction? We'll be very disappointed otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Left them there with instruction to return a few "days later and escort them to the underground river. Returned and I heard something cruel. Some "low, echoing howl. (weak scream) It was much scarier than that. Shaking, I got there, right? "Fucking hell. Outside the house, all of them, dead. Strung up in reeds and roots. Bloated and "left as a warning, that's what I say. I hear the howl again, and I just run."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm covering Kiri's ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There be curses in this swamp. Have been since before this loathsome struggle shithole's "been here. (tearfully) Nightmares I been having, yeah? Been having ever since. Whatever it is, it's "gotten in me head! I ain't going. It ain't worth it if I had the coin!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we paid you 100 coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll come for that." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. We could do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You just said "coin," right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just said "coin." I didn't make it clear which kind of coin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Copper? 100 copper?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 100 copper? 100 silver, okay, 100 silver, you got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half and half. Little gold, little silver. Silver and gold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which make--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make it a hundred gold pieces and buy me a drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pour you a drink. I'll refill his cup. Does he have a cup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's knocked over and spilled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my flask, I'll fill it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's one part of it taken care of!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And the other?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half now, half upon--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Upon delivery to the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a persuasive Jessie--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not, it's really not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it, Jessie!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "100 gold now, or you're pissing up the wind to find this little place!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be a dick to us. You already said you were scared of us bringing you back to The Gentleman. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Kiri, like Jester) "What are you going to do?" Your bird friend says. He goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what she said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Febron) "Look. I'm going to be risking my life, I'm going to do it for the right amount "of coin, okay? It's a service I'm providing. You can drag me back if you like. It's a pain in the ass!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, you got to risk your life for the coin, or we can drag you back, as you said, without any coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then drag me back! Take me back to him! Empty-handed in the deal you're looking for!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 100 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you sing us a song. On the stage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "100 gold."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another persuasion check. With disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because Matt doesn't want to sing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he doesn't want to sing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Deal, but it's a short song!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Does everyone want to chip in a little bit of gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to point out, this is entirely your doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to give you all my gold. That is one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take Caleb's share.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, you are so broke all the damn time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have two silver and five copper!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are so broke all the damn time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How. Broke. Am I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is like sorting out a check at the end of a meal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give you 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give you 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give you 20. I'll cover Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 plus 20, 12, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Accounting in D&D!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to do 20 from me, too, so that's 72, and then one from Caleb, so 73, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 27 from me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but I didn't put any. I'll put in ten, and you put in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Here's your gold. All of us pulled together. Now go sing your song! Wait, shake my hand because-- eww.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really important to shake when you make a deal. And look me in the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His one eye wandering.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Both of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Power ballad!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make it a good one. One we all know the words to. I want to sing along! I yell at him as he walks away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slinks over. The stage is only partially up, and the two guys go-- "Just a moment." They're like, "Fuck off!" "Just a fucking moment! Just one!" They're like, "Fucking hell, Febron, "seriously?" They step back, cross their arms and he gets up on the stage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Margaritaville!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks at the pouch of coins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Free Bird!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stairway to Heaven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing off-key) "All the sailors say: Brandy, you're a fine girl. What a good wife you "could be."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you know this one.

lines.name: MATT, ASHLEY
lines.text: "But my life, my lover, my lady is the sea!" (laughter and applause)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need a drink!" He goes back towards the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are we leaving in the morning? When are we doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When do you want to leave?"

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: In the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got some shopping to do, we've got to run around a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A soft 10:30.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you already give him the gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hang on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He ain't going to fucking be here in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You ain't taking it back!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Excuse me, how do we know you're going to show up tomorrow? And not just run away with the gold?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he is staying with us this evening.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, that's right. You're staying with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm staying with you?"

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure. Fine. Great."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Take your pick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Choose wisely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I sleep naked. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ready to snuggle, big lady?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Literally, they've cleared out most of the ruin of the old establishment below it, and there are four separate rooms with a small hallway between, like a cross-section hallway, that are built as a subterranean sleeping quarters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cool!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no windows! It feels very much like a prison cell with a bed, but it's functional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there two beds in the rooms, or is it just one bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One bed per room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels very trendy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Time to snuggle up, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's taking Kiri?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Kiri's staying with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's four rooms: one of them is Yasha and the weirdo--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly and Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you and Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. As we go into our room, I say to Caleb: It's not really haunted, is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I highly doubt it. I mean, it's possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. We need to take the cart to the stables.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're putting our stuff down and we're also-- How late is it at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's post-sundown. In the time of searching the city, having the drink and conversation, it's probably close to 9:30, 10:00, probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Maybe we should have the guy take it. Or should we just leave it outside? I think that's a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a terrible idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have him take care of it. Well, we know what's in it. There's inventory, so if anything's missing, it's on him. It's on Dent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yes, we'll have Dent take it to the stables.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think he has insurance to cover lost goods? Because I don't think he does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insurance? No, we are in a podunk town, there is no insurance here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking all the horses and the cart to the stables, Dent, looking it all over, charges you two silver for the service.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him and make sure he's going to be honest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A natural one. He's the most trustworthy guy I've ever met in my entire life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems above board, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone should go with him and we get the valuables off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to rethread the silver that is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we've been here an hour, there are seven hours-ish left on the spell. That'll get us through most of the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What all's in there? You have the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, does that go with the cart?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I thread the cart, but you have the thingy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the most important thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only thing on the cart is your thing that you bought at the festival and some crocodile skins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Some leather, some armor. There's a few things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm fine to send it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, here's a couple silver for you. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries, happy to help!" He goes and carries it off and takes care of it for the evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Nott, I would not worry: the spookiest thing in this place is us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather your things and bed down for the evening, taking your respective chambers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (squeaking) Quick conversation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just, quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (squeaking) (squeaking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Kiri.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the hooligans are getting ready for bed, I wanted to say to Nott: You know, I think, for obvious reasons now, I have kept a lot of things close to the vest, and those things are out. If you ever want to talk about anything-- now or later, after you think about it-- you are my friend, and you can talk to me-- if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That means a lot to me, and-- oh, hello.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't see you through your booze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was going to say, it's the full Wilson effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just want you to be okay. It sounds like this person who corrupted you is out there still, and we need to find him and you know, kill him or whatever? If that's something that you want to do? I'm fine focusing on that. I've got my own issues, but I'm fine taking care of yours first. The thing is, your story that you poured out to me and Beau, the other day-- it was very sad, and I'm so sorry that you had to go through it, but I have to say, in a way, I'm a little bit jealous. Because you've done this horrible thing-- not to make light of it or anything, but it's bad-- and we can all tell that you're wearing it in your dirty clothes and your mussed hair--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm clean right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I know, but still-- You know when you're dirty and it rains, and it streaks down and dries? That's the sort of thing you've got going on right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like you've just kissed Spider-Man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, an hour in, yeah, but we were in the rain for like, 48 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you've got a lot of dirt on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, did Laura Bailey put you up to this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. All I'm saying is, I feel like you can get revenge. You can maybe even get redemption for what you've done, and you can become a better person. You can do good to counteract the bad that you've done in your past, and maybe someday there will be an end to your suffering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're getting ahead of yourself, okay? I am a garbage person. Let's put that on the table. But while I am a piece of shit, we can help each other in the short term. This is going further than I anticipated. I just meant that if-- These people we are with are all interesting, and great-- and untrustworthy, but great-- but I trust you, which wasn't really true three weeks ago. I just mean I wasn't-- I don't know, words don't do it. Talk to me if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Thank you for the offer. Good night, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gute nacht.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you think Captain Max-dung, whatever his name was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maximilian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maximilian meant by (exaggeratedly sexy) "I'll see you again."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he was saying something that cute guys sometimes say, those kind of things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like, "Ooh, I hope our paths cross again someday, ooh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then later on in the book, you run into him again, and he remembers you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're like, "Ooh, that's Captain Max."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then he takes off his helmet this time, and you see that he's got the most fabulous hair that blows in the wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man, you're like, "I never knew he had such luscious locks, mmm."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Maximilian is probably like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so, too. Do you think he had the hots for any one of us? Do you think that's why he said this like, "I want to see you again."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably had the hots for you, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he had the hots for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, probably not!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was Yasha!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Maybe it was Yasha. Maybe it was like, "Ooh, I'm a captain."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Beau) "Ooh, I'm a captain."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Have you ever read Tusk Love, Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (curious chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, maybe Kiri shouldn't read Tusk Love just yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scoots chair closer)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, how old are your parents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (confused chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know how old they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (confused chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How old are you compared to most people that are like you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (confused chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that means she's pretty young.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Kiri, where do babies come from? She doesn't know what the hell we're talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Beau) "Where do babies come from?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your voice is very low, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that how I sound?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You kind of do sound like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, I have a lot to re-evaluate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got some nuts on you there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to think about some things. We should go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hanging brain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to spend the evening telling Kiri basically the story of Tusk Love--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she doesn't have to read it, I can leave out the really dirty bits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fall asleep 20 minutes in, drooling a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tell her all about Oskar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri is just enthralled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the most beautiful love story you've ever heard in your entire life, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (trilling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw pictures of it to illustrate what I'm talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you could see a blackbird blush. Molly and Fjord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not that I don't trust this place or like it, but I'm thinking about locking the door a little more heavily than normal. I'm going to wedge my sword underneath the door to make sure that it can't open without moving the sword. It's a lot of new people today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like new people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any moisture in the corners of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you guys notice, two of the rooms are dry, two of the rooms have about half an inch of water on the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one is ours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half an inch of water on the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really don't mind, This is actually pretty familiar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with this as well. This is fine. I'll take the bed, though, if you're offering!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gulps drink) "Hello."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (electric guitar riff)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I start pushing the bed up against the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting. Right, okay." He starts taking his linen shirt off: it's stained and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now, you can sleep with your clothes on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can, but it's not as comfortable."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I throw him a pillow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. You first."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sleeping in the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, me too."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, you didn't pay for this room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "May I sleep in the bed?'"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gum popping) No. You won't fit in the bed with me. I am very big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's try."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." He lays down on the somewhat slightly waterlogged floor, takes the pillow and bundles it up in the corner of the room and lays down next to it. You have a little oil lamp that you can put out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to leave it on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leave that shit on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I sit up against the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys all eventually get to sleep. You get an evening's rest, managing to adjust to the unpleasant smell of somewhat swamp bog water-soaked subterranean inn room, but the night comes and passes. We'll pick up next week as the morning comes to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Febron is totally telling his friends that he nailed a barbarian.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll see what happens!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to become that story that everyone hates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Febron) So I had her alone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a creepy little fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You never know! He could get lucky!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Febron) It's me pheromones!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gets them everytime, eh?" Thank you, guys! That was fun. Moving right along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like this place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a new notebook after this session.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You filled that whole thing?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She writes at like font 55.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Each page is a centimeter thick, though, on this book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and each page has like 15 words in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there's illustrations, maps, curse words, colors--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Learn from our monk!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Punisher skulls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Skulls are bad guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's good annotation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smart!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mountain range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you recognized it as a mountain range! That's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who wants the coin in the morning, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is a clever system.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't used it, yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but in the morning, somebody gets it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott'll take the Fragment of Probability in the morning. We'll pick this up next Thursday! Also, we're going to have a guest next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've told you this a number of times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I remembered, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Playing the kenku?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. We have a guest: my brother from another motherland for the past decade in the world of D&D. Some of you may know him from his online D&D stream, High Rollers: Mark Hulmes will be in town and joining us as a guest next week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No Englishmen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too bad, he's coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We already had Kit. We already had an Englishwoman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She was the last one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated American accent) But only if he does an American accent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want full Benedict Cumberbatch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated American accent) I'm from California.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we could get it out of him at some point, that'd be great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love a fake American accent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark's a long-time friend. He came and watched the show live when we first started streaming long ago. Happy to have him come in and join us next week. Excited for that, Mark. We'll see you then. The rest of you, rest well, have a wonderful weekend. You as well. We love you, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
